<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// check lowering. For each call instruction with a cfi-type attribute, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// emits an arch-specific check before the call, and bundles the check and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
